dcterms:creator: W. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A widely used benchmark data for graph learning, which is a citation network, where each node represents a research paper, and edges denote the citation relation. Node features are extracted from the abstract of the paper.
dcterms:title: Cora

dcterms:creator: W. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: Another citation network used frequently in GNN literature. It follows a similar structure to the Cora dataset, where each node represents a scientific document, and the edges are citation information between them. The node features are derived from the text of the documents.
dcterms:title: CiteSeer

dcterms:creator: W. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A citation network composed of scientific papers related to biomedicine. As with the other datasets, nodes represent documents, and edges indicate citation relationships. Node features correspond to term frequency-inverse document frequency (TF-IDF) representations of the documents.
dcterms:title: PubMed

dcterms:creator: W. Hamilton
Z. Ying
J. Leskovec
dcterms:description: A subset of the full Cora dataset, retaining the same structure but restricted to documents and citations within the field of machine learning. The node features are the bag-of-words representation for the papers.
dcterms:title: FullCoraML
